effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
short_effect.platinum: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding.
flavor_text.platinum: The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding.
